content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1/2 cup uncooked long grain rice" )

content.text: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and drained" )
( ing-6 "1 (2.8 ounce) can French-fried onions, divided" )

content.text: 1 pound fresh or frozen fish fillets, thawed
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 pound fresh or frozen fish fillets, thawed" )

content.text: 0) In a greased 11-in. baking dish, combine the broth, rice, Italian seasoning and garlic powder.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@36:43 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "broth"@48:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "rice"@55:59 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "Italian seasoning"@61:78 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "garlic powder"@83:96 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a greased 11-in. baking dish"@6:34 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Cover and bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Cover"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "bake"@13:17 / AC
		:heat ( temp-1-0 "375 degrees F"@21:34 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-1-1 "190 degrees C"@-1:-1 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "10 minutes"@-1:-1 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Add the broccoli, Parmesan cheese and half of the onions.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "broccoli"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "Parmesan cheese"@21:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "half of the onions"@41:59 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Top with fish fillets; sprinkle with paprika.
4) Cover and bake 20-25 minutes longer or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.
5) Uncover; sprinkle with cheddar cheese and remaining onions.
6) Return to the oven for 3 minutes or until cheese is melted.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Return"@3:9 / AC
		:gol ( tool-6-0 "the oven"@13:21 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "3 minutes"@26:35 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until cheese is melted"@39:61 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
